name: espn_scrape_standings
description: Scrape league standings for a sport on ESPN. Returns team names with their win/loss records and stats.

steps.code: const headers = []; document.querySelectorAll('table thead th, table thead td, [class*="Table__TH"]').forEach(th => { const text = th.textContent?.trim(); if (text) headers.push(text); }); const teams = []; document.querySelectorAll('table tbody tr, [class*="standings"] tbody tr').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 40) { const nameEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/team/"], .team-link, [class*="TeamLink"], td:first-child a'); const cells = el.querySelectorAll('td'); const stats = []; cells.forEach((c, ci) => { if (ci > 0) stats.push(c.textContent?.trim()); }); if (nameEl?.textContent?.trim()) { teams.push({ team: nameEl.textContent.trim(), url: nameEl.href || '', stats: stats }); } } }); return { sport: `{{sport}}`, headers: headers, team_count: teams.length, teams: teams };
steps.name: result
steps.label: Extract standings
